tool_description: Logs completed maintenance activities to historical database for tracking, analysis, and compliance documentation.

work_order_id.description: Completed work order ID to log

final_cost.description: Actual total cost of maintenance work

quality_rating.description: Quality rating of work performed (1-5 scale)

warranty_period_days.description: Warranty period for the maintenance work

error_messages: Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist or is not completed.
Invalid final cost: final_cost must be a positive number.
Invalid quality rating: quality_rating must be between 1 and 5.
Invalid warranty period: warranty_period_days must be between 0 and 365.
Logging error: Unable to save maintenance record to historical database.
usage: Provide work_order_id and final_cost for completed maintenance, optionally add quality rating and warranty information. Creates permanent maintenance history record.

history_record_id.description: Unique ID of the created history record

vehicle_id.description: Vehicle ID associated with the maintenance
